reviews.review_text: Love it! I have curly and frizzy fine hair, and this adds an incredible shine and softness to it, and relaxes the curls a bit. In extreme humidity (like very rainy weather on my trip to London) it helped but obviously it does not waterproof your hair, and so you have to have reasonable expectations.  This is now a staple in my routine! The spray isnu2019t really any harder to spray than my regular leave in conditioner spray. Also love that it comes with a little cap to prevent the spray from spraying when itu2019s in luggage/traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair
reviews.review_text: I have fine, low-density (THIN!) hair that's wavy if left on it's own to air dry, curly if loaded up with gel, manipulated/scrunched for half an hour and diffused. I'm trying to be lower-maintenance with my hair and let it air dry more often, so I'm looking for one-and-done products that work well without a lot of fussing & intervention.   This stuff really does feel/smell like nothing when it goes on (which makes it a little tricky to know if you've distributed it well). As it begins to dry, a cast does form and it can feel a little brittle/sticky/crispy while drying.   Once it's dry I'd say it does a few things well:   Definition is good (better than most of my other air-dry creams).  Frizz control seems good (curl clumps seem to have plenty of hold) Seems to enhance my wave pattern a little.   But the cast is fairly tough to release (which means a lot of scrunching/touching, which is annoying when you just want to spray something in and head out the door).   I suspect the bottle will be gone in no time (it does take a lot of product to cover my hair and I really don't have much hair....I'm guessing 6-10 uses out of one bottle if I'm lucky, so it's pricy).   Overall: don't hate it, don't immediately love it, but I probably don't have anything else like it in my closet full o' hair products (and it does seem to work well on it's own).   Haven't tried it layered with anything else, and I tend to wash daily (or put my hair up), so not sure how well it does with a refresh on days 2, 3, 4.
